## ParticleEmitterEventPayloads."PARTICLE\_EMITTER.SET\_GRAVITY" property

Emitted when the gravity vector for an emitted particle is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[ParticleEmitterEvent.SET_GRAVITY]: {
        particleEmitter: ParticleEmitter;
        gravity: Vector3Like;
    };
```
